author: Jeff Cox
title: That 50-year low in unemployment isn't helping worker paychecks
description: Sharp drops in unemployment in the past often have brought commensurate earnings, but not this time around.
content:
The U.S. jobs market's resilience is not extending to wages, which fell in September for the first time in two years as companies still aren't ready to meet a tight labor market with higher pay and workers still are not demanding more.
While the September no… [+5309 chars]
